name: Hentai Tales: The World Only Maid
name_original: Hentai Tales: The World Only Maid
description:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

You wake up and find yourself in a strange room, and a maid next to you wakes you up.
You seem to be the master of the house and have countless maids who will do anything you command.
Even if it's a little confusing, you decide to enjoy the situation.
What will happen?

Characters

Marina:

The maid you see the first time you wake up has a beautiful face and figure.
She seems to be responsible for serving your daily meals.

Shiniro:

Shiniro is the maid in charge of the kitchen and has a very attractive and plump buttocks.
She is also the chef who cooks for you.

Kansia:

Kansia is the head maid of the maids, and she often yells at the maids for their little mistakes.
Beneath the harsh exterior, there seems to be some fire of desire hidden in the heart.

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)
